message.body: Hi. How are you?
Hi
My phone was off out of battery just got in and and charging it now.
Just got back from memorial day weekend at my parents. What are you up too?
Getting ready to head back to work after the long weekend. Where do your parents live? Did you have to travel far?
We live in philadelphia they live in nj just a 1 hour train but it was raining when we got here
and we have a 9 month old so everything takes longer
where about are u
I am in CA
nice!
Hows the weather where you are at?
raining right now but humid yesterday was perfect tho sunny not humid nice breeze how about over there?
this upcoming they are saying it will be the low 90s hoping to get to the beach! do you live near the beach?
Rained this morning, but supposed to be sunny this afternoon
There is one about 15 mins away on the bay....takes about half an hour to get to the coast
How far are you from the beach?
nice. your so lucky wish i was closer to the beach its about 1 hour 1/2 away but the one we like to go to is 2 hours with traffic on a sunny hot day like
3 hours
Yeah, the beach I go to is is about 2.5 hrs away. The closer ones arnt that great for swimming.
yea never been to ca but i bet some of the beaches are like paradise like they are in central america! we go to costa rica
In southern CA they are very nice. I am near San Francisco so tends to be pretty foggy.
that sucks! this summer we are going to portugal to visit my family that is where we are from. they call portugal the little california of europe- nice w
eather and beaches
Nice! How long will you be there for?
1 month hoping to go to spain and morocco too. do you have plans for summer
No big plans this summer. A few weekend trips, but nothing major.
yea that what i did last couple years been saving up for this trip.
When was the last time you went to Portugal?
oh gosh 5 years ago i miss everyone terribly. last time i went to central america was 3 years back but went to arizona in march
